name: Silverwood Court
description: An exquisite modernist villa nestled in the prestigious Vienna suburbs, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and seamless indoor-outdoor living spaces.

name: Crystal Heights
description: A stunning penthouse with panoramic Baltic Sea views, featuring contemporary architecture and premium finishes throughout.

name: Sunset Residences
description: A spectacular Nordic estate offering breathtaking fjord views, sustainable design, and world-class amenities.

name: Azure Villa
description: An iconic waterfront villa on The Palm featuring private beach access, infinity pool, and unparalleled luxury.

name: Monte Verde Estate
description: A beautifully restored historic villa with modern amenities, lush gardens, and stunning city views.

name: Alpine Retreat
description: An exclusive Alpine estate offering ski-in/ski-out access, spa facilities, and majestic mountain panoramas.
